Russian Ambassador hosts reception 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Andrei Karlov, Russian Ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on Tuesday evening on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
 Present there on invitation were Ri Kwang Gun, Minister of Foreign Trade, Kung Sok Ung, vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs, Jon Myong Guk, vice-Minister of Forestry, Jo Chan Gu, vice-Minister of Culture, Hong Son Ok, chairperson of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association who is also vice-chairperson of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.

Greetings to Tunisian Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Cabinet Hong Song Nam Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Mohamed Ghannouchi, Prime Minister of Tunisia, on the occasion of the 47th National Day.
 The message sincerely wished the prime minister and the government greater success in the work to build a highly developed national economy.    
 Meanwhile, Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a similar message to his Tunisian counterpart Habib Ben Yahia.

articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian President 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Zine El Abidine Ben Ali, President of Tunisia, on the occasion of its 47th National Day.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the president and, through him, to the government and people of Tunisia on this occasion.    
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger to meet the needs and desire of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the president greater success in the work to build a developed and prosperous new society.
